summary:
The Thegn is a steel Viking Longsword, it's craftable and can be found under the steel section, the stats are similar to those of a Ebony Longsword.

The textures are high resolution (2048x2048) and have been designed for a simple yet realistic look for the sword.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo346/InsanitySorrow/ThegnTitle_zps8e23a8f2.png[/img][/center]



=================
Requirements:
=================

Skyrim 1.9.32.0

=================
Description:
=================

The Thegn is a steel Viking Longsword, it's craftable and can be found under the steel section, the stats are similar to those of a Ebony Longsword.

The textures are high resolution (2048x2048) and have been designed for a simple yet realistic look for the sword.

=================
Installation
=================

1. Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
2. Make sure the The Thegn .esp is checked in the Launcher

=================
Un-Installation:
=================

1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod
2. Uncheck the The Thegn.esp is checked in the Launcher

=================
Contact:
=================

InsanitySorrow @ TES Alliance

=================
Credits:
=================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to http://www.albion-swords.com for the design.

=================

Blender

=================
Licensing/Legal:
=================

Please do not re-host this file without my explicit permission.

==================
Modder's Will:
==================

If I am offline for six months or longer and do not respond to any attempts made at contacting me, I give full Ownership of my Projects to TES Alliance.

TES Alliance are free to modify/redistribute/remove as they see fit.
